text: Elijah Wilson (born May 14, 1995) is an American professional basketball player for MKS Dąbrowa Górnicza of the Polish Basketball League (PLK). He played collegiately for Coastal Carolina before turning professional in 2017. He formerly played in Austria. He won the 2019 ABL championship with Kapfenberg Bulls and afterwards was named the Finals MVP. ==Honours== ;Kapfenberg Bulls *Austrian Basketball Bundesliga: 2018–19 *ABL Finals MVP: 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Elijah Wilson at RealGM * Elijah Wilson at Basketballleague.nl Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Austria Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from North Carolina Category:Coastal Carolina Chanticleers men's basketball players Category:Dutch Basketball League players Category:Flyers Wels players Category:Heroes Den Bosch players Category:Kapfenberg Bulls players Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Wilmington, North Carolina
title: Elijah Wilson
